title: Authors and Citation
text: Hesselberth J (2024). cpp11bigwig: Read-access bigWig Files. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/rnabioco/cpp11bigwig, https://rnabioco.github.io/cpp11bigwig/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {cpp11bigwig: Read-only access to bigWig Files},   author = {Jay Hesselberth},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0,     https://github.com/rnabioco/cpp11bigwig},   url = {https://rnabioco.github.io/cpp11bigwig/}, }

title: Read-only access to bigWig Files
text: cpp11bigwig provides read access bigWig files R using libBigWig. Data read R data.frame.

title: Read-only access to bigWig Files
code: # Install development version from GitHub # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("rnabioco/cpp11bigwig") library(cpp11bigwig)  bw = system.file('extdata', 'test.bw', package = 'cpp11bigwig')  read_bigwig(bw) ##   chrom start end value ## 1     1     0   1   0.1 ## 2     1     1   2   0.2 ## 3     1     2   3   0.3 ## 4     1   100 150   1.4 ## 5     1   150 151   1.5 ## 6    10   200 300   2.0

what: cpp11bigwig: read data from bigWig files — cpp11bigwig-package
title: cpp11bigwig: read data from bigWig files — cpp11bigwig-package
text: bigwig provides methods read data bigWig files. bigwig uses cpp11 wrap libBigWig @dpryan79.

title: cpp11bigwig: read data from bigWig files — cpp11bigwig-package
cpp11bigwig: read data from bigWig files — cpp11bigwig-package

what: Read data from bigWig files. — read_bigwig
title: Read data from bigWig files. — read_bigwig
Read data from bigWig files. — read_bigwig
code: read_bigwig(bwfile, chrom = NULL, start = NULL, end = NULL, raw = FALSE)

title: Read data from bigWig files. — read_bigwig
text: bwfile filename bigWig file chrom read data specific chromosome start start position data end end position data raw return raw data, single-base intervals

title: Read data from bigWig files. — read_bigwig
Read data from bigWig files. — read_bigwig
code: bw <- system.file('extdata', 'test.bw', package = 'cpp11bigwig')  read_bigwig(bw) #>   chrom start end value #> 1     1     0   1   0.1 #> 2     1     1   2   0.2 #> 3     1     2   3   0.3 #> 4     1   100 150   1.4 #> 5     1   150 151   1.5 #> 6    10   200 300   2.0  read_bigwig(bw, chrom = "10") #>   chrom start end value #> 1    10   200 300     2  read_bigwig(bw, chrom = "1", start = 100, end = 130) #>   chrom start end value #> 1     1   100 130   1.4  head(read_bigwig(bw, raw = TRUE), n = 10) #> Error in read_bigwig(bw, raw = TRUE): unused argument (raw = TRUE)
